thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Collin

author: Collin
title: Collin
text: B&H may not always be the best price, but their website is above all others in detail and product information. You shouldn't buy anything without researching it at B&H first. The only issue is their frequent holiday schedule and unexpected closures, but hey, you take the good with the bad. If they were open 24/7 365 they would clearly just take over the world, so this is kind of a checks and balances thing.
